entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.3°C

Observed at: Red Earth 3:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
